title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou
synopsis: The Holy Britannian Empire is a powerful nation that uses its military strength to expand its rule, and the small island nation of Japan is yet another victim. During a worldwide conflict in 2010 known as the Second Pacific War, the once-proud country was reduced to rubble and mockingly renamed to Area 11.
related_anime: ['Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Kamen Kokuhaku Taikai', 'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch II - Handou', 'Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch']
